editorialSummary.text: Swanky steakhouse with plush seating featuring upmarket cuts of beef plus an extensive wine list.

originalText.text:
Was there last week.
I don’t know why anyone would give anything less than 5 stars. Beautiful ladies, beautiful atmosphere, perfect in every way.

originalText.text: Scammy place. They made a movie about how this place would steal from men. Its called Hustlers and its actually a good watch lol

originalText.text: Used to be an employee here! Fun place to be

text.text: Used to be an employee here! Fun place to be

originalText.text:
I had such an awesome time visiting NYC. The manger was an amazing guy very friend. bar tenders were super sweet loved them and the dancers were beautiful and great
Also we got referred by The manger to check out scores in Manhattan so after dinner at Gallagher’s we walk across the street it was super close to our hotel and checked out there second location they treated us like royalty it was totally worth the thousands+ we sent and Now i am a huge fan Scores best strip club in NYC beautiful women at each location

Shout out to the manger for referring us
Thank you, you’re the best ❤️

originalText.text: Here is what happened. I went with a few friends to see G-eazy last Saturday. Everything was as expected but the twist came when we were trying to get our coats at coat check. They not only took over an hour, but fights started, police had to enter the club, and even then a lot of people couldnt find their coats. (At one point they started arbitrarily picking up coats and trying to yell individual numbers at a crowd of at least 500+ people). The nightmare ended for me when we went in individually into the coat room and had to find our coats myself which happened over an hour after actually exiting the dance hall and into the hallway. (Our coats had the numbers ripped off of them so even if they did the coat check as they should have, they still wouldn't have found ours). The final straw for me writing this here is when I checked my credit card, my girlfriend, and my other buddy were each overcharged 10 dollars. That's not even bad customer service, that's explicit fraud. Anyone else experience this? I wouldn't be against starting a class action. If everyone that used their card that night got overcharged, imagine the total amount they have stole from all of their patrons. Thoughts?
